FuncDef: The display lldp neighbor command displays Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) neighbor information about a specific or all interfaces. The display lldp neighbor command displays Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) neighbor information about a specific or all interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays LLDP neighbor information about a specified interface.
If this parameter is not specified, LLDP neighbor information about all interfaces is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo: To view neighbor information on interfaces, run the display link neighbor command. The command output contains information about neighbors of a local device, the interfaces that the neighbors use to connect to the local device, and Layer 2 information about these neighbors. The command output helps check whether Layer 2 configurations of the neighbors are correct.
